about_the_game:
It's an uphill battle of wits, pride, and a whole lotta Neptunia guts! Grab the Survival Mode DLC, which unlocks a Survival Mode in the coliseum. Challenge yourself by defeating as many enemies as possible, but be wary! After each battle, you do not get HP recovery, so plan accordingly.

Wanna see who reigns supreme in survival mode? All survival mode records are stored on an online ranking system through Steam. High ranking individuals also receive additional rewards!

Additional Notes: BGM can be changed during survival mode. Players can pick the BGM or have it play in random.
Colosseum must be unlocked to access this DLC.
detailed_description:
It's an uphill battle of wits, pride, and a whole lotta Neptunia guts! Grab the Survival Mode DLC, which unlocks a Survival Mode in the coliseum. Challenge yourself by defeating as many enemies as possible, but be wary! After each battle, you do not get HP recovery, so plan accordingly.

Wanna see who reigns supreme in survival mode? All survival mode records are stored on an online ranking system through Steam. High ranking individuals also receive additional rewards!

Additional Notes: BGM can be changed during survival mode. Players can pick the BGM or have it play in random.
Colosseum must be unlocked to access this DLC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7(64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
